  • Help

    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Interface representing the game board and its operations.
    BombBrick
    Represents the Bomb Brick.
    BombManager
    Manages the inventory and activation state of bombs.
    BombPanel
    A custom UI component representing the Bomb inventory.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick.
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating bricks.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of a brick.
    ClearRow
    Data object representing the result of a row clearing operation.
    Constants
    Defines global constant values used throughout the application.
    DownData
    Data wrapper containing the result of a downward movement event.
    EventSource
    Enumeration representing the source of an event.
    EventType
    Enumeration representing the different types of events that can occur in the game by each brick.
    GameController
    Controls the main game Logic and acts as the bridge between UI and game Logic.
    GameInputHandler
    Handles keyboard input for the game.
    GameLoopManager
    Manages the game loop (gravity) using a JavaFX Timeline.
    GameMode
    Enumeration representing the different game modes available.
    GameModeSelectionController
    Controller for the Game Mode Selection screen.
    GameOverPanel
    A custom UI component representing the "Game Over" screen.
    GameRenderer
    Handles all graphical rendering for the Tetris game.
    GuiController
    The main coordinator class for the UI.
    IBrick
    Represents the I Brick.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling input events in the game.
    InstructionsController
    Controller for the Instructions screen.
    JBrick
    Represents the J Brick.
    LBrick
    Represents the L Brick.
    LevelManager
    Manages game levels based on the player's score.
    Main
    The entry point for the Tetris application.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix manipulation.
    MoveEvent
    Represents a movement event within the game.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data holder for the next rotation state of a brick.
    NotificationPanel
    A temporary floating panel used to display score bonuses .
    OBrick
    Represents the O Brick in Tetris.
    PauseMenuController
    Controller for the Pause Menu overlay.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Concrete implementation of BrickGenerator that provides random bricks.
    SBrick
    Represents the S Brick in Tetris.
    Score
    Manages the player's current score and high score persistence.
    SimpleBoard
    Represents the game board logic, handling grid state, brick movement, and game mode specifics.
    SoundManager
    Manages the audio system for the game, including background music and sound effects.
    TBrick
    Represents the T Brick in Tetris.
    TitleScreenController
    Controller for the main Title Screen.
    ViewData
    Immutable data transfer object that holds the state of the game required for rendering.
    ZBrick
    Represents the Z Brick in Tetris.
